subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Doug McDermott, a two-time Missouri Valley Conference player of the year, could be a dynamic player in the N.C.A.A. tournament, but first Creighton has to get there.
snippet: Doug McDermott, a two-time Missouri Valley Conference player of the year, could be a dynamic player in the N.C.A.A. tournament, but first Creighton has to get there.
